WorkItem.ClosedComment: 4.1.05 Released. If this is still an issue, please reopen with exact steps to reproduce and any necessary character files
WorkItem.Description: In 4.1 mastery breakpoints no longer exist, but rawr is still incorporating them (at least giving me warnings about them).

Comments.Message: If you're still using 4.1.03, make sure to enable PTR Mode.  If you're using 4.1.04, mastery breakpoints are removed, but the tooltip might still show it because I probably forgot to remove that code.  This is just a display issue, and the breakpoints aren't actually being calculated.

Okay yes there is a tooltip that shows it still in 4.1.04.  I realize this is incredibly unhelpful but unfortuantely I cannot seem to recall where I saw it.  It was a pop up box when I was playing with Optimizer I think.
Yeah, I'll be removing the tooltip the next time I'm in the module.  Thanks :)
Removed unused tooltip in latest source.
